dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: ...they've just, like, really noticed ticket prices on some routes, um, going way up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...they've just, like, really noticed ticket prices on some routes, um, going way up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis have noticed rising ticket prices on certain train routes, prompting a response from Kazakhstan Temir Zholy (KTZ).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Way up? You mean, like, 50% up since last year, on many routes? That's not "some."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Way up? You mean, like, fifty percent up since last year, on many routes? That's not some.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Since last year, ticket prices on many routes have gone up by more than 50%," one user noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, KTZ, the train company, they've, uh, responded to that. They say it's, like, a government-approved methodology.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, K T Z, the train company, they've, uh, responded to that. They say it's, like, a government-approved methodology.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, KTZ explained that train fares are set according to a government-approved methodology that regulates price caps for socially significant routes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Government-approved. Right. So, the government approved them jacking up prices? Sounds like PR, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Government-approved. Right. So, the government approved them jacking up prices? Sounds like P R, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they, uh, say it regulates price caps for, like, socially significant routes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they, uh, say it regulates price caps for, like, socially significant routes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In response, KTZ explained that train fares are set according to a government-approved methodology that regulates price caps for socially significant routes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And all the other routes just get, what, free reign? Because people are saying flights are almost the same price now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And all the other routes just get, what, free reign? Because people are saying flights are almost the same price now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They explain it depends on, um, travel distance, train category, and carriage type. Standard stuff, they claim.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They explain it depends on, um, travel distance, train category, and carriage type. Standard stuff, they claim.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Ticket prices depend on travel distance (in kilometers), train category (express, passenger, branded), and carriage type (SV, coupe, platzkart, general).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Standard stuff doesn't usually lead to a 50% hike in a year. That's, uh, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Standard stuff doesn't usually lead to a fifty percent hike in a year. That's, uh, pretty significant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They do say it aligns with international standards, and, like, other CIS countries use it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They do say it aligns with international standards, and, like, other C I S countries use it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This pricing method aligns with international standards and is used across CIS countries to maintain a unified approach to railway tariffs," the company stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So everyone's doing it? That doesn't make it right. It just means everyone's overcharging.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So everyone's doing it? That doesn't make it right. It just means everyone's overcharging.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, they also reminded passengers about, like, discounts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, they also reminded passengers about, like, discounts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: KTZ also reminded passengers that people with disabilities receive a 50% discount on socially significant train routes, as well as in designated compartments on commercial Talgo trains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, good. A consolation prize. What kind of discounts? For who?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, good. A consolation prize. What kind of discounts? For who?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: People with disabilities get 50% off on socially significant routes, and, like, their companion too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People with disabilities get fifty percent off on socially significant routes, and, like, their companion too.

dialogue_turns.text: Fifty percent off if you're lucky enough to find one of these "specialized compartments," I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fifty percent off if you're lucky enough to find one of these specialized compartments, I bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: You can book them commission-free online, they say, using an IIN.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Discounted tickets can be booked commission-free through the companyâ„¢s website by entering an individual identification number (IIN) and disability certificate number," KTZ added.
